q: In May 2009, Hillary Clinton met a delegation of Egyptian dissidents, several of which had met Condoleezza Rice a year earlier. These high level meetings were held a week prior to Barack Obama 's visit to Egypt: U.S. Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton praised the work of a group of Egyptian civil society activists she met with today and said it was in Egypt's interest to move toward democracy and to exhibit more respect for human rights. The 16 activists met with Hillary Clinton and Acting Assistant Donald Rumsfeld of State for Near Eastern Affairs Jeffrey Feltman in Will Washington at the end of a two-month fellowship organized by Freedom House's New Generation program. The fellows

Thursday, he would earn about$ 334.7-million on the stock sale. He would still own about 2.7 per cent of Google Inc. 's outstanding capital stock, down from 2.9 per cent before selling the shares. As Google Inc. has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. "And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured."

The group is launching an independent spending effort to convince Mike Pence to run, The group, "America's President Committee," begins a website, www.theconservativechampion.org, and a signature drive Monday. Mike Pence has gotten buzz on the right in part because he's seen as a candidate who could unify the three traditional constituencies within the GOP- social conservatives, economic conservatives and foreign-policy conservatives, the news service states.
